game.name: Stuck In The Backrooms
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Stuck In The Backrooms is a horror multiplayer (1-4) exploration game where players find themselves trapped in a different reality. Solve puzzles and investigate levels while avoiding (OR NOT...) entities. Some things were never meant to be found…
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stuck In The Backrooms is a horror multiplayer (1-4) exploration game where players find themselves trapped in a different reality. Solve puzzles and investigate levels while avoiding (OR NOT...) entities. Some things were never meant to be found…
